wipe_lamp_base.description: Wipe the lamp base to ensure cleanliness.

rotate_rotation_bar.description: Rotate the rotation bar for angle adjustment.

rotate_fastener.description: Rotate the fastener to secure the lamp.

rotate_head.description: Rotate the lamp head for directional light adjustment.

wipe_head.description: Wipe the lamp head to ensure brightness.

clean_entire_lamp.description: Clean the entire lamp including the lamp base, rotation bar, fastener and head.
